title: Ticket #4384: Version check for command QUERY_JOB_ADS off by one
description: When the new CEDAR command QUERY_JOB_ADS was added, version checks were added in the query client code to only use it if the schedd is known to support it. But the version was off by one. It should be 8.1.5, not 8.1.4. One of the checks was fixed in the release where the command was added, but two were missed.
